title: Ep. 984 - Covid Mandates And Gay Robots
description:
Biden reportedly plans to extend the federal mask mandate, Hollywood hypocrites remove a gay movie scene to appease China, and Charlie Kirk explains why tall buildings make people more liberal.

The magic has left the kingdom. It’s time to build new things that we can believe in. Subscribe to The Daily Wire today with promo code BUILDTHEFUTURE for 45% off: https://utm.io/uereW
